params.who: is the address that called the function.

returns.forwarderAddress: The address of the Forwarder contract that is being used.

returns._0: bool if the forwarder is trusted.

RequiresForwarderManager(address).notice: Happens when a function is called by a non forwarder manager.

ForwarderChanged(address).notice: Emited when a forwarder is set on an implementing contract.

getTrustedForwarder().notice: WARNING: The Forwarder can have a full control over your Recipient. Only trust verified Forwarder.Method is not a required method to allow Recipients to trust multiple Forwarders. Not recommended yet.

userdoc.notice: The Marketplace Forwardable facet is in charge of "gasless transactions".
